english: Charm is the great english blight .
chinese: 魅力是一种损害伟大英格兰的疾病。

english: War and disease had thinned the population .
chinese: 战争和疾病已使人口减少。

english: An army of doctors blitzed the disease .
chinese: 一大批医生对这种疾病发起猛攻。

english: Stress should be put on the prevention of diseases .
Displacement of the lens is not uncommon .
chinese: 晶体脱位是常见的疾病。
疾病造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: There is little sickliness here this year .
At best it was a disease-ridden barren country
chinese: 那无非是个疾病流行的穷国。

english: Disease and hunger took a heavy toll .
chinese: 疾病和饥饿使他们许多人丧失了生命。

english: Rat-fleas communicate a disease to man .
chinese: 鼠蚤会把疾病传染给人。

english: It acted as the carrier of this disease .
The treatment has no efficacy in that disease .
chinese: 这种疗法对那种疾病不管事。

english: No other infection so quickly slays .
chinese: 再没有别的疾病会造成如此迅速的死亡。

english: He is seized with a painful sickness .
chinese: 他得了一种痛苦的疾病。

english: Illness had rendered him rather weak .
chinese: 疾病使得他相当虚弱了。

english: The holy man healed them of their sickness .
chinese: 那位神职人员治好了他们的疾病。
